AT.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Red Sun
AT.description: Lan und sein virtuelles Gegenstück Mega Man.EXE müssen sich einer doppelten Bedrohung stellen, als ein Asteroid auf die Erde zusteuert und ein mysteriöser NetNavi das Netzwerk bedroht. Und dann müssen sie auch noch ihre Fähigkeiten im NetBattle Turnier unter Beweis stellen. Teils Rollenspiel, teils Kampfsimulation, Mega Man™ Battle Network 4 gibt es in zwei Versionen: Red Sun und Blue Moon. Beide Spiele bieten unterschiedliche Handlungsverläufe, Feinde, Battle Chips und Upgrades. Sammle Battle Chips, um deine Strategien aufzustellen, und aktiviere das neue Soul Unison-System, um spezielle Fähigkeiten zu erhalten.

movies.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Blue Moon & Red Sun: Video

AU.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Red Sun
AU.description: Lan and his computer counterpart Mega Man.EXE face double trouble from an asteroid hurtling towards Earth, and a mysterious NetNavi threatening the network. Meanwhile the pair must prove their skills in a new NetBattle tournament. Part role-playing game, part battle simulation, Mega Man™ Battle Network 4 comes in two versions: Red Sun and Blue Moon. Each include separate storylines, enemies, Battle Chips and upgrades to discover. Collect Battle Chips to select your strategies, and activate the new Soul Unison system to gain special abilities.

movies.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Blue Moon & Red Sun: Video

BG.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Red Sun
BG.description: Lan and his computer counterpart Mega Man.EXE face double trouble from an asteroid hurtling towards Earth, and a mysterious NetNavi threatening the network. Meanwhile the pair must prove their skills in a new NetBattle tournament. Part role-playing game, part battle simulation, Mega Man™ Battle Network 4 comes in two versions: Red Sun and Blue Moon. Each include separate storylines, enemies, Battle Chips and upgrades to discover. Collect Battle Chips to select your strategies, and activate the new Soul Unison system to gain special abilities.

BE.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Red Sun
BE.description: Lan et son alter ego cybernétique Mega Max.EXE sont confrontés à une double menace : un astéroïde se dirige vers la Terre pendant qu'un mystérieux NetNavi menace le réseau. Au même moment, le duo doit prouver son talent dans un nouveau tournoi de NetBattle. Mêlant jeu de rôle et simulation de combat, Mega Man™ Battle Network 4 comporte deux versions : Red Sun et Blue Moon. Ces deux versions ont des histoires, des ennemis, des améliorations et des Battle Chips différents à découvrir. Récupérez des Battle Chips pour choisir de nouvelles stratégies et activez le nouveau système Soul Unison pour accéder à de nouvelles techniques.

movies.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Blue Moon & Red Sun : vidéo

ES.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Red Sun
ES.description: Lan y su homólogo cibernético, Mega Man.EXE, se enfrentan a un doble problema: un asteroide que se apromixa a la Tierra y un NetNavi misterioso que amenaza la red. Mientras tanto, ambos deben demostrar sus habilidades en un nuevo torneo NetBattle. Mitad juego de rol, mitad estrategia, Mega Man™ Battle Network 4 cuenta con dos versiones: Red Sun y Blue Moon. Cada una incluye historias, enemigos, Battle Chips y mejoras diferentes. Reúne Battle Chips para seleccionar tus estrategias y activar el nuevo sistema Soul Unison, que te permitirá adquirir habilidades especiales.

IT.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Red Sun
IT.description: Lan e la sua controparte digitale Mega Man.EXE affrontano una duplice minaccia: un asteroide che si dirige verso la Terra e un misterioso NetNavi che minaccia la rete. Nel frattempo, il duo deve dimostrare le proprie capacità in un nuovo torneo NetBattle. Un mix di gioco di ruolo e simulatore di combattimenti, Mega Man™ Battle Network 4 vanta due versioni: Red Sun e Blue Moon. Ogni versione include trame, nemici, Battle Chip e upgrade differenti tutti da scoprire. Colleziona i Battle Chip per pianificare le tue strategie e attiva il nuovo sistema Soul Unison per guadagnare abilità speciali.

movies.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Blue Moon & Red Sun: video

movies.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Blue Moon & Red Sun: Video

NL.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Red Sun
NL.description: Lan en zijn virtuele alter ego Mega Man.EXE worden geconfronteerd met gevaar van twee kanten; een asteroïde die op de aarde afstormt, en een mysterieuze NetNavi die het netwerk bedreigt. Ondertussen moet het duo hun vaardigheden bewijzen in een nieuw NetBattle-toernooi. Mega Man™ Battle Network 4, deels RPG, deels gevechts-simulatie, wordt uitgebracht in twee verschillende versies: Red Sun en Blue Moon. Iedere versie heeft een afzonderlijke verhaallijn, vijanden, Battle Chips, en verbeteringen om te ontdekken. Verzamel Battle Chips om je strategieën te kiezen, en activeer het nieuwe Soul Unison-systeem om speciale vaardigheden te bemachtigen.

movies.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Blue Moon & Red Sun: Video

NZ.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Red Sun
NZ.description: Lan and his computer counterpart Mega Man.EXE face double trouble from an asteroid hurtling towards Earth, and a mysterious NetNavi threatening the network. Meanwhile the pair must prove their skills in a new NetBattle tournament. Part role-playing game, part battle simulation, Mega Man™ Battle Network 4 comes in two versions: Red Sun and Blue Moon. Each include separate storylines, enemies, Battle Chips and upgrades to discover. Collect Battle Chips to select your strategies, and activate the new Soul Unison system to gain special abilities.

PL.description: Lan and his computer counterpart Mega Man.EXE face double trouble from an asteroid hurtling towards Earth, and a mysterious NetNavi threatening the network. Meanwhile the pair must prove their skills in a new NetBattle tournament. Part role-playing game, part battle simulation, Mega Man™ Battle Network 4 comes in two versions: Red Sun and Blue Moon. Each include separate storylines, enemies, Battle Chips and upgrades to discover. Collect Battle Chips to select your strategies, and activate the new Soul Unison system to gain special abilities.

movies.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Blue Moon & Red Sun: Video

PT.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Red Sun
PT.description: Lan e a sua versão virtual, Mega Man.EXE, enfrentam sarilhos a dobrar: um asteroide que se dirige para a Terra e um misterioso NetNavi que ameaça a rede. Entretanto, o par deverá provar as suas habilidades num novo torneio NetBattle. Parte RPG, parte simulador de batalha, existem duas versões de Mega Man™ Battle Network 4: Red Sun e Blue Moon. Cada uma inclui diferentes histórias, inimigos, Battle Chips e upgrades a descobrir. Coleciona Battle Chips para selecionar as tuas estratégias e ativar o novo sistema Soul Unison que te dará habilidades especiais.

movies.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Blue Moon & Red Sun: Vídeo

RU.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Red Sun
RU.description: Лану и его компьютерному двойнику Mega Man.EXE предстоит спасти землю от стремительно направляющегося к ней астероида, спасти сеть от таинственных NetNavi, и испытать свою силу в новом турнире NetBattle. Объединяя в себе элементы ролевой игры и стратегии, Mega Man™ Battle Network 4 предлагается вашему вниманию в двух версиях: Red Sun и Blue Moon. Эти версии отличаются друг от друга своим уникальным контентом, в том числе сюжетом, врагами, Battle Chips и улучшениями. Собирайте Battle Chips, чтобы открывать все больше стратегий боя, и активируйте новую систему Soul Unison, чтобы получать особые способности.

movies.name: Megaman Battle Network 4 Blue Moon & Red Sun: видео
